content:
Sure, here are possible research hypotheses based on the objectives and research questions:

1. Null hypothesis (H0): There is no significant impact of digitalization of tax administration on cadaster registration of assets.
Alternative hypothesis (HA): There is a significant impact of digitalization of tax administration on cadaster registration of assets.
2. Null hypothesis (H0): There is no significant impact of digitalization of tax administration on self-assessment in the tax system.
Alternative hypothesis (HA): There is a significant impact of digitalization of tax administration on self-assessment in the tax system.
3. Null hypothesis (H0): There is no significant influence of digitalization of tax administration on tax filing and tax authority assessment.
Alternative hypothesis (HA): There is a significant influence of digitalization of tax administration on tax filing and tax authority assessment.
4. Null hypothesis (H0): There is no significant effect of digitalization of tax administration on compliance enforcement through audit and investigation.
Alternative hypothesis (HA): There is a significant effect of digitalization of tax administration on compliance enforcement through audit and investigation.
5. Null hypothesis (H0): There is no significant impact of digitalization of tax administration on the judgments of the tax appeal tribunal.
Alternative hypothesis (HA): There is a significant impact of digitalization of tax administration on the judgments of the tax appeal tribunal.
6. Null hypothesis (H0): There is no significant effect of digitalization of tax administration on compliance monitoring in the tax system.
Alternative hypothesis (HA): There is a significant effect of digitalization of tax administration on compliance monitoring in the tax system.
